data.name: Cyber Girl
data.detailed_description:
Realistic living cyberpunk style girls on your desktop. Watching you, interacting with you, staying with you.

Features

  • Realistic living cyberpunk style girls with 25 skins, 2 types of skirt (free & formfitting)
  • Realistic lips 'glue-like' effect, sensitive to light eye pupil
  • Realistic muscle flexing simulation of limbs (depending of bones angle)
  • Realistic breathing simulation (chest movement)
  • Realistic eyes direction, eyes blinking, eye micromotion for realistic gaze simulation
  • Realistic skirt morph repeating thigh position (fitting cloth)
  • Support smile and some face expression simulations
  • some makeups, hair styles, neon glasses, space helmet
  • Support act on top of other windows (Optional)
  • Support idle animations and interacte with mouse cursor
  • Support dances for your favorite music
  • Compatible with all other software and live wallpapers.
  • Supports Windows 7 (with Aero), 8, 8.1 and 10

Credits

Cyber Tower (Girl) Model and Video by IL.ranch

data.short_description: Realistic living cyberpunk style girls on your desktop. Watching you, interacting with you, staying with you.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 8.1 / 8 / 7
  • Processor: Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Graphics 4000 or above
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660, AMD HD7870, 2 GB VRAM or above
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain some nudity or sexual content
